AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: dockworker nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]s father was a dock worker in the province of Nordland and [PAWN_possessive] mother tended to their home. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood playing on the docks and occasionally earned some coins by helping the dockworkers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: shipwright nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] comes from a lineage of nordlander shipwrights. [PAWN_possessive] Family had been building ships at the docks arcoss the Nordland for generations and [PAWN_pronoun] was from a young age taught how to do it aswell.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: sailor nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] hails from the costal province of Nordland. [PAWN_possessive] a sailor, often gone from home for many months at a time. [PAWN_nameDef] had constantly help [PAWN_possessive] mother at home in his absence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: marine nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a lineage of soldiers who has served the Nordland Marines for generations. [PAWN_pronoun] followed [PAWN_possessive] father whenever he was home, learning how fight, mend and tend the ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: pirate nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a family of nordlander outcasts. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a rough life among a group of pirates, but during [PAWN_possessive] time with them [PAWN_pronoun] learned many things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: fishmonger nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born to a family of fishmongers in Nordland, [PAWN_nameDef] helped with gutting and selling the wares at the local markets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: civil servant nordlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning how to read and calculate. All to join the family lineage as bureaucrats among the Nordland trade offices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: citizen middenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in the safe confinement of a Middenland city. [PAWN_nameDef] family lived in the city doing whatever menial labour that was available.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: civil servant middenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] comes from a lineage of middenlanders who has served as bureaucrats for generations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ulric worshipper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]s family were firm believers of The Cult of Ulric. [PAWN_pronoun] was often forced to watch and perfrom cermons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: soldier middenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a soldier of Middenland. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught how to wield weapons and maintain them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: militia middenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a familiy of menial labourers in Middenland. [PAWN_possessive] father was part of the local militia patroling the town and [PAWN_pronoun] was brought up to join their vigilant watch.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: rural middenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in the more rural country side of Middenland. Tending to farmwork and other menial labour around the homestead.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: shipwright ostermark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in family of shipwrights in Ostermark. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time helping out with the crafting of riverboats that was to either be exported or keept within the province.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: forester ostermark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] trudged across the Ostermark lands foresting timber with [PAWN_possessive] father.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: shepherd ostermark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood herding the family sheep in the wet and foggy land of Ostermark.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: militia Ostermark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a local militia man in the Ostermark. [PAWN_pronoun] spent the years being taught by [PAWN_possessive] father and the other militia men how to handle the weapons and spot danger. One day [PAWN_possessive] fathers group was lost in the moors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: soldier hochlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a family of soldiers in Hochland. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught by [PAWN_possessive] family how to fight and survive the harsher northern region.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hunter hochlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a lowly family of hunters in the northern parts of Hochland. Without fertile lands [PAWN_pronoun] learner [PAWN_possessive] parents trade of surviving and avoiding the dangers of the harsh land.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: forester hochlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived with [PAWN_possessive] in Hochland chopping and gathering timber for Hochlands largest trade. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained like most hochlanders how to survive the harsh land.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farmhand wissenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a low working family of Wissenland. [PAWN_pronoun] helped out on the small and rocky farmlands of Wissenland, earning [PAWN_possessive] first coin plucking the blue flint stones off the fields during the spring ploughing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: miner wissenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived at the most western part of Wissenland. [PAWN_possessive] family working the mines to supply the industrial powerhouse of The Empire. There was constant tension between the dwarfs and the humans surrounding the mining in the territory. [PAWN_nameDef] constantly observed and took part in the race conflicts with the nearby Dwarf operations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: worker wissenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born in a low wage worker family in Wissenland. [PAWN_possessive] father worked in the local factory for The Empires black-powder weaponry production.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bandit wissenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran with a posse out in the western reaches of Wissenland. To stony, no fertile lands, no desire to work the mines nor slave away in the black-powder factories. [PAWN_pronoun] joined a group of troublemakers in the rocky hills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: guard wissenlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_possessive] father was a guard for the local trade routes in the western parts of Wissenland. He would be gone for weeks on end but when he was home he taught [PAWN_nameDef] how to fight. When [PAWN_nameDef] was older [PAWN_pronoun] would join [PAWN_possessive] father on work patrols.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: forester talabeclander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of foresters in the province Talabecland. As many other families in the province they made their living of the old and primordial forest, though dangerous [PAWN_nameDef] learned how protect [PAWN_objective]self.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: charcoal burner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of charcoal burners in the province of Talabecland. There [PAWN_pronoun] learned [PAWN_possessive] family trade, tending to the flames of the big burners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: trapper talabeclander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] snuck around the Talabechlands woodlands trapping small animals and the occasional larger prey. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to learn how to tend for [PAWN_objective]self and survive alone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bandit talabeclander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in The Farlic Hills of Talabecland. There [PAWN_pronoun] preyed upon the traffic of the Old Forest Road, making a living.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: militia talabeclander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] life as a menial worker in Talabeclands. But when the occasions demanded it [PAWN_pronoun] joined the local militia to ward of local bandits and wildlife.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: trader talabeclander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born to a family of traders in Talabecland. [PAWN_pronoun] observed the haggling and deals of the busy trade routes of the Empire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: militia stirlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] born of Stirland heritage. [PAWN_possessive] father fancied themself a proud and upstanding citizen of Stirland, patrolling the muddy streets laying down the "law" on outsiders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: tapster stirlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] family ran a tavern in the deep of Stirland. [PAWN_pronoun] spent the time working the tap, cleaning (in loose term) and occasionally roughing up the drunk.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deathjack
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]s family had ties to the Stirland Deathjacks. [PAWN_possessive] parents disappeared every now and then for days on end, leaving [PAWN_objective] alone to tend to the homestead. But every now and then [PAWN_nameDef] would get to join [PAWN_possessive] family on the occasional runs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farmer stirlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a farm in the rural lands of Stirland, tending to the family farm and fighting of the occasional beast prowling in the dark.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: worker stirlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of workers in the province of Stirland. They spent their time doing menial labour in the village and nearby farmsteads.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: citizen stirlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mostly survived on [PAWN_possessive] own. After [PAWN_possessive] father had a run in with the Lords men, [PAWN_pronoun] was left crippled and damaged. So the breadwinning was left to [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Reiksguard lineage
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the South-weastern province of Reikland. [PAWN_possessive] family served in the prestigious Reiksguard, leaving [PAWN_objective] with the burden to always prove themself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mining reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a family of miners in Reikland. [PAWN_possessive] family toiled in the lower slopes of the Grey Mountains extracting precious minerals and gems.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: border reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born close to the Grey Mountains in the province of Reikland. [PAWN_possessive] father served as a borderguard potecting the slopes against whatever lurks in the mountains and past it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: farmer reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in the fertile and rolling hills of Vorbergland in the province of Reikland. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood tending fields and animals and the occasional visit to the large markets selling the family goods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hunter reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived a relatively safe life in the Reikwald. There [PAWN_possessive] family spent their time hunting the wild life and living a modest life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: citizen reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived with [PAWN_possessive] family in the civilized city of Reikland, surrounded by the safe confine of the stone walls doing the work that was offered.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: noble reiklander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in Reikland to a family of low nobles. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood practising whatever the latest craze the nobles caught fancy of.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beaver hunter averlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the far east in Averland. Instead of mining along the mountain ranges, [PAWN_possessive] family took on the hunters trade. [PAWN_objective] childhood was spent stalking the woods for beavers and otters. With the occasional visit to the markets to sell the acquired furs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mining averlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the far east in Averland along the foothills of the Black Mountains and Worlds Edge Mountains. There [PAWN_possessive] family made their living toiling in the mines for minerals and gems. Constant conflict with the Dwarfs sparked a dislike for other races within [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wineyard averlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a wineyard in the province of Averland. Raised with a family of vintners, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_objective] years tending to the grapes and learning the winemaking trade.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Noble averlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in Averland to a up and coming family. While [PAWN_possessive] grandparents taught [PAWN_objective] the old trade of cattle herding. [PAWN_possessive] own parents felt they were to good for it and tried to instill the finer arts of the empires nobles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Central averlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lineage stretches to the south-eastern Imperial Province of Averland, raised on the open fields of Averland. [PAWN_pronoun] partoke of the farm life, Tending the land and raising cattle. The culinary art of the simple but hearty meals and the famous brewing lives on in [PAWN_nameDef].
